title: 下载
description: 通过官方受信的镜像源下载Rocky Linux发布版本.
notInProduction: The release you can download here is a <0>Release Candidate</0> and should not be used in production. Please check our <1>FAQ</1> for more information.
invitation: As you download and use Rocky Linux, the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation invites you to <0>be a part of the community as a contributor</0> . There are many ways to contribute to the project, from documentation, QA, and testing to coding changes for SIGs, providing mirroring or hosting, and helping other users.
